ref_item.label: IONIS-HBVRx
ref_item.description: Ascending multiple doses of IONIS-HBVRx by subcutaneous (SC) injection

pred_item.label: On-NA: Bepirovirsen 300 mg
pred_item.description: Patients with chronic hepatitis B already receiving stable nucleos(t)ide analog (NA) therapy (tenofovir disoproxil fumarate or entecavir for ≥12 months) received bepirovirsen 300 mg via subcutaneous injection twice weekly during weeks 1 and 2 (days 1, 4, 8, 11) and once weekly during weeks 3 and 4 (days 15, 22). Patients continued their stable NA therapy throughout the study until end of study (day 211).
interventionNames: DRUG: Nucleos(t)ide analog (tenofovir disoproxil fumarate or entecavir)

ref_item.label: Placebo
ref_item.description: Sterile Normal Saline (0.9% NaCl) calculated volume to match active comparator

pred_item.label: On-NA: Placebo
pred_item.description: Patients with chronic hepatitis B already receiving stable nucleos(t)ide analog (NA) therapy (tenofovir disoproxil fumarate or entecavir for ≥12 months) received placebo via subcutaneous injection twice weekly during weeks 1 and 2 (days 1, 4, 8, 11) and once weekly during weeks 3 and 4 (days 15, 22). Patients continued their stable NA therapy throughout the study until end of study (day 211).
interventionNames: DRUG: Nucleos(t)ide analog (tenofovir disoproxil fumarate or entecavir)

ref_item.name: IONIS-HBVRx
ref_item.description: Ascending multiple doses of IONIS-HBVRx by subcutaneous (SC) injection

pred_item.name: Bepirovirsen 300 mg
pred_item.description: Bepirovirsen (ISIS 505358; GSK3228836) is an antisense oligonucleotide targeting all hepatitis B virus (HBV) messenger RNAs. Administered as 300 mg subcutaneous injection twice weekly during weeks 1 and 2 (days 1, 4, 8, 11) and once weekly during weeks 3 and 4 (days 15, 22).

pred_item.name: Placebo
pred_item.description: Placebo administered via subcutaneous injection twice weekly during weeks 1 and 2 (days 1, 4, 8, 11) and once weekly during weeks 3 and 4 (days 15, 22).
